data.actual_result: Notice that "Hide names" is unchecked and clicking it doesn't do anything
data.expected_result: "Hide names" is checked and clicking it toggles the name visibility
data.short_description: The visibility of a voice channel player list can't be managed by mouse when hidden with key combo
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a voice channel - hide the names using the key combo (ctrl+shift+a) - Right click on the joined voice channel
